TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StringEnumerator extends System.Object

summary.span: 支持对 执行简单迭代。

span.span: Supports a simple iteration over a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置，调用引发异常。At this position, calling throws an exception. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过的末尾的集合，枚举数定位在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置上，后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，则调用引发异常。If the last call to returned `false`, calling throws an exception. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改，例如添加、 修改或删除元素，则枚举数将失效且不可恢复失效，并且下次调用或引发。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果之间修改集合和，返回到，设置的元素，即使枚举数已经无效。If the collection is modified between and , returns the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示几个属性和方法的。The following code example demonstrates several of the properties and methods of . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2/CPP/stringenumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2/CS/stringenumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2/VB/stringenumerator.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公共静态 (在 Visual Basic 中) 的此类型的成员都是线程安全。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

public: property System::String ^ Current { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取集合中的当前元素。

span.span: Gets the current element in the collection.
The current element in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建一个枚举器或调用时，必须调用来枚举器向前移动到集合，然后再读取的值的第一个元素; 否则为是不确定的。After an enumerator is created or after a is called, must be called to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of ; otherwise, is undefined. 如果最后一次调用到也会引发异常返回`false`，指示集合的末尾。 also throws an exception if the last call to returned `false`, which indicates the end of the collection. 不会移动的位置的枚举器，并对连续调用之前返回同一对象或调用。 does not move the position of the enumerator, and consecutive calls to return the same object until either or is called. 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改，例如添加、 修改或删除元素，则枚举数将失效且不可恢复失效，并且下次调用或引发。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果之间修改集合和，返回到，设置的元素，即使枚举数已经无效。If the collection is modified between and , returns the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示几个属性和方法的。The following code example demonstrates several of the properties and methods of . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2/CPP/stringenumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2/CS/stringenumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2/VB/stringenumerator.vb#1)]

exception.span: 枚举器位于集合中第一个元素之前或最后一个元素之后。

span.span: The enumerator is positioned before the first element of the collection or after the last element.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool MoveNext() cil managed

summary.span: 将枚举数推进到集合的下一个元素。

span.span: Advances the enumerator to the next element of the collection.

returns.span: 如果枚举数已成功地推进到下一个元素，则为 ；如果枚举数传递到集合的末尾，则为 。

span.span: if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建一个枚举器或是调用，枚举数定位在集合中，并且首次调用的第一个元素之前将枚举器移到集合的第一个元素上。After an enumerator is created or after a is called, an enumerator is positioned before the first element of the collection, and the first call to moves the enumerator over the first element of the collection. 如果越过的末尾的集合，枚举数定位在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置上，后续调用还返回`false`直到调用。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false` until is called. 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改，例如添加、 修改或删除元素，则枚举数将失效且不可恢复失效，并且下次调用或引发。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果之间修改集合和，返回到，设置的元素，即使枚举数已经无效。If the collection is modified between and , returns the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示几个属性和方法的。The following code example demonstrates several of the properties and methods of . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2/CPP/stringenumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2/CS/stringenumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2/VB/stringenumerator.vb#1)]

exception.span: 集合在枚举器创建后被修改。

span.span: The collection was modified after the enumerator was created.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 将枚举数设置为其初始位置，该位置位于集合中第一个元素之前。

span.span: Sets the enumerator to its initial position, which is before the first element in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将枚举器移动到集合，在第一个元素的开头。 moves the enumerator to the beginning of the collection, before the first element. 后，必须调用来枚举器向前移动到集合，然后再读取的值的第一个元素。After , must be called to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示几个属性和方法的。The following code example demonstrates several of the properties and methods of .
